item.title: kfc
item.description:
<!--more-->

<style>
	.coupon {
		float: left;
		margin: 5px;
		position: relative;
		background: #F7F7F7;
		font-size: 0;
	}
	.coupon img {
		height: 140px;
	}
	.coupon h4 {
		position: absolute;
		background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8);
		margin: 0;
		font-size: 2rem;
		left: 0;
		bottom: -1px;
		border-top-right-radius: 5px;
		padding: 2px 5px;
		display: block;
	}

</style>

<coupon-list />

<script src="/js/riot.min.js"></script>
<script src="/js/kfcoupon/all.js"></script>
<script>
	function main(data) {
		riot.mount('*', data);
	}
</script>

<script src="http://kfcoupon-mcfog.c9.io/coupon?callback=main"></script>
